skills.description: BMAD workflow orchestrator. Auto-invokes at conversation start, routes phases, and answers status requests. Keywords: status, workflow, next, start, guide.
Brainstorms ideas and researches projects. Invoke when user says 'I have an idea' or 'What if we'. Keywords: idea, brainstorm, explore, research.
Creates PRDs and feature plans after discovery. Invoke for 'plan this feature' or 'write requirements'. Keywords: PRD, requirements, plan, build, roadmap.
Designs UX flows and wireframes once PRD exists. Invoke for UI questions like 'design the UX' or 'user flow'. Keywords: UX, UI, wireframe, design, experience.
Produces technical architecture after planning. Invoke when user asks 'how should we build' or 'tech stack'. Keywords: architecture, design, build, stack.
Creates test strategies and ATDD scenarios. Invoke for 'how should we test' or 'test plan'. Keywords: testing, QA, strategy, ATDD, quality.
Breaks epics into developer-ready stories. Invoke for 'break into stories' or 'developer tasks'. Keywords: stories, backlog, sprint, breakdown.
Implements approved stories with code and tests. Invoke for 'implement story', 'start coding', or 'write the code'. Keywords: implement, code, develop, build.
Creates and validates Claude skills. Invoke for 'create a skill', 'new skill', or packaging requests. Keywords: skill, create, validate, package.
Creates lightweight change proposals for Level 0-1 work. Invoke for 'fix this bug' or 'small change'. Keywords: bug, fix, small, quick, Level 0, Level 1.
Implements approved OpenSpec changes. Invoke for 'apply the change' or 'implement proposal'. Keywords: implement, execute, apply, change, Level 0, Level 1.
Archives completed OpenSpec changes. Invoke for 'archive this change' or 'close the change'. Keywords: archive, document, close, change, Level 0, Level 1.
